title: Foreigners buy $1.8 million worth Sri Lanka rupee bonds last week

byline: 'Marine Nights: Awakening Colombo' project to facilitate night tourism

title: Sri Lanka preserved financial system stability amidst severe economic crisis: CB
byline: This was achieved without a single financial institution failure governor tells forum

byline: The central bank has announced an issue of Rs162,500mn Treasury bills, and an issue of 200,000 million Treasury bonds
